n. 铃，钟；钟声，铃声；钟状物
To bell is to attach a bell or bells to something, or to ring a bell to make a sound.
A bell is a hollow, usually metal, cup-shaped object that produces a ringing sound when struck.
n. 铃，钟；钟声，铃声；钟状物,vt. 装钟于，系铃于,vi. 鸣钟；成钟状鼓起
